ComicInfo.Summary:
While Batman (Azrael) speeds toward the Crooked Man's mansion, the Chain Gang storms the premises in an all-out attack. Meanwhile, Deathstroke the Terminator escapes the House of Correction.

ComicInfo.Title: The Crooked Man, Part 3: Welcome to the Pit!
